EmailTemplate.subject: Build software people love with Spring and Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
That was an amazing event! I’d bet that the keynote and breakout speakers at Pluralsight Live inspired you in many ways. We at Pivotal would like to help you take your next steps. Our products support a modern approach to software development that challenges tradition, optimizes for change, and drives transformation. Looking to change how your company plans and delivers software? Our Pivotal Labs <[[https://pivotal.io/labs?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pluralsight-live-utah-q317]]> team helps startups and enterprises learn lean startup principles, and use them to build disruptive software products. Want to build modern microservices and user experiences in Java? Use Spring Boot and Spring Cloud <[[https://pivotal.io/spring-app-framework?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pluralsight-live-utah-q317]]> for modern, resilient apps that delight your users. Need a place to run your apps that’s reliable, portable, and caters to continuous delivery? Then Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://pivotal.io/platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pluralsight-live-utah-q317]]>, the trusted platform at companies like Allstate, Citi, The Home Depot, Verizon, Liberty Mutual, Ford, and more, is for you. And with other leading software products like Pivotal Container Service, Concourse, Greenplum, and Gemfire, Pivotal is helping companies like yours make building software fun again.
Pivotal partnered with Pluralsight to offer three self-paced developer courses exclusively on their platform. Our recently updated Pivotal Cloud Foundry Developer course has ranked in the top 5% of all Pluralsight courses for the 4th consecutive month! Check out our course titles here <[[https://www.pluralsight.com/partners/pivotal/courses]]>.
You can also learn more about how Pivotal can help you build great software by reading our free eBooks <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pluralsight-live-utah-q317]]>, downloading Spring packages <[[https://spring.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pluralsight-live-utah-q317]]>, starting a free trial of Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pluralsight-live-utah-q317]]>, or downloading a local version of Cloud Foundry <[[https://pivotal.io/pcf-dev?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pluralsight-live-utah-q317]]> for on-the-go development.
Ready to get started today? Reach out to us and see how we can partner with you to deliver software that people love.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
